text:
[Verse]
Steps in the puddles
Hear the rhythm
Raindrops falling
A symphony

[Verse 2]
Splashing in circles
Laughter echoes
Water gleaming
Under lights

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the freedom
Let it wash away
All the sorrow

[Verse 3]
Stormy skies above
But we don't mind
Heartbeats keeping
Perfect time

[Bridge]
Hold my hand tight
Spinning around
World is a blur
Feet off the ground

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the freedom
Let it wash away
All the sorrow
title: Dancing in the Rain
